actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Children, Family,Drugs and Alcohol.

official_title: A bill to reimburse the State of Florida and its political subdivisions for certain costs incurred in furnishing services to certain aliens.
short_title: State of Florida Alien Services Reimbursement Act of 1985

summary.text: State of Florida Alien Services Reimbursement Act of 1985 - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to reimburse the State of Florida and its subdivisions for costs incurred in providing certain aliens with specified social and related services.

titles.title: State of Florida Alien Services Reimbursement Act of 1985
A bill to reimburse the State of Florida and its political subdivisions for certain costs incurred in furnishing services to certain aliens.
